modName: Horseback Magic and Philter of Phantom
summary:
adds the ability to use a bound bow or potions that emulate Candlelight on Horseback, as well as apply special effects to your character such as Philter of Phantom, or fiery specter.

Only Skym No DLC Required!!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#980000]No DLC Required
No Scripts
No animations

[/color][/size][color=#8e7cc3][size=3]Just a simple potion mod that adds some spice to your characters appearance, and a way to use destructive spells on Horseback.
I tried Horsemen by Rongphale, it was nice and worked for a bit, but I have Convenient Horses, and it was still glitches.
So I stumbled upon this (BY LUCK) that by use of a potion I was able to acquire the Bound Bow. So I simply adjusted the Projectiles to become Fire, Frost, and Shock elements and it worked, even on horseback.

Since I had already began working on a potions mod here, I thought it would be a great addition to it. This is still in early stages, so bear with me. But you may like the Specter and Philter of Phantom potions as a cosmetic source for your character.

There still some things to check, like the projectiles still utilize the destruction tree perk, and so forth.
There is Philter of Phantom
Philter of Phantom (Violet)
Effect Restore - For the Specter and Phantom, after the Duration your character will be slightly invisible, this will fix it.
Ebony/Stone/ and Oak Flesh - just like the spell, but potion form, great for Horseback.
Fire/ Frost/ Storm Specters - Just like Phantoms but give off a unique illusion
Clairevoyance - Works but not very resourceful, especially on horseback
Ebony Cloak - Similar as the Boethia ebony Cuirass, but no armor required
Candlelight - Potion form great for Horseback.

These Potions use new ingredients, and can only be obtained through Cooking other ingredients. No to hard to acquire but still enough to make you go searching.
[color=#980000][size=6]File 1[/size][/color] is the main mod, nothing in the CK was altered except Shrouded HearthBarrow where Wyndelis is located. A new chest with ingredients in it, and a cooking pot.

[color=#980000][size=6]File 2[color=#8e7cc3][size=3] is the same but I altered all cooking pots to use the Alchemy Skill.[/size][/color][/size][/color]
[/size][/color]
